mapper.select: SELECT * FROM users ORDER BY reg_date DESC

SELECT u.user_id ,u.password ,u.name ,u.birth ,u.address ,u.mail ,u.phone ,u.reg_date ,u.upd_date ,u.enabled ,u.role ,auth FROM users u LEFT OUTER JOIN user_auth auth ON u.user_id = auth.user_id WHERE u.user_id = #{userId}

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO users ( user_id, password, name, birth, address, mail,phone, role ) VALUES ( #{user_id}, #{password}, #{name}, #{birth}, #{address}, #{mail}, #{phone}, #{role} )
